Detailed Description

XXHash (32 bit), based on Yann Collet's descriptions, see http://cyan4973.github.io/xxHash/.

How to use: uint32_t myseed = 0; XXHash32 myhash(myseed); myhash.add(pointerToSomeBytes, numberOfBytes); myhash.add(pointerToSomeMoreBytes, numberOfMoreBytes); // call add() as often as you like to ... and compute hash: uint32_t result = myhash.hash();

or all of the above in one single line: uint32_t result2 = XXHash32::hash(mypointer, numBytes, myseed);

Note: my code is NOT endian-aware !
